Articles.Content:
I found a system with a boatload of Larimar asteroids (The kind needed for shield capacitors), and then Xacktar and I mined a bunch of them using a "feature" he found.

If you wait for a server save, then mine the asteroid and leave the sector before the next server save so that it unloads, then wait for the server to save again and warp back, the asteroids will (usually) be back. So, infinite shield asteroids! (Hopefully, we've found about ten in total and one or two have disappeared already, but the others are still there)

I constructed ~56,000 shield capacitors (I think).

Sadly, the group of four seems to have vanished as well. I got another 100,000 rammet out of them beforehand, though.
Well, that's at least good. We'll likely have to find more soon.

Well, that's at least good. We'll likely have to find more soon.

Yeah, there are still some around the same sector, just sad to lose the best deposit.

Also! I got the two main turrets working on the Hephaestus!
Nice xack wish i could say same ; )

Edited September 12, 2015 by Xacktar

hum look like the server has trouble, kinda sad because i worked three days kinda hard on that baby, wich is my first ship "real" battle ship anyway ; )

It's Called: Chandra Ananta

(picture next are not the totatlly finished version & logo is the japanese kenji "Shi" wich mean "death")

Javascript is disabled. View full album

So basically ...

... It's kinda a rail gun but with (more or less) around x2 50k max speed missiles per 0.5s. & a few other lovely missiles addition between thoose per 3s & 15s.

Weapon and defense side:

around 1,4million e/s

thrust ratio around 1/1

defensive punch through and percing 25%

1 million shield

2 missiles @ around 25k to75k per 0,5sec (logic straight line, fast speed + high range & auto shot yes that hurt a lot xDr never stand in front of that baby)

1 missile a 200k+ per 45s (Manual smart, fast speed & ion effect @ 75% => shield dmg x3)

1 missile low to medium damage ( straight line, fast speed + high range, logic auto with stop effect / 15s)

1 missile low to medium damage (straight line, normal speed & range, logic auto per 3s .)

Currently has room for 12 turrets (probably 8 antimissile, 4 dunno yet)

Full interior, + hangar (8 drone or very small ship)

Bedroom, kitchen, mess, deck, storage, machinery

Somehow it's "not far" from higlhy to "close to" perfectly math opti in term of number of blocks/mass/efficiency energy & weaponry/lite rp ratio

(as less disminishing return applied as possible in // with highest e/s ratio available in game)

Btw Xactar black and red colour scheme theme too here , may be we should think of an alliance xDr per in game colour kind of affinity.

Aetherion is back!

(It got corrupted and was down for a while. Everything got reset, at least for now, but all the configs are in place.)

I've got a makeshift miner and refining base set up, aiming to finish these in SP and then build them on-server:

Hangar bays 1 and 2 of a carrier/battleship.

Large ship, with a nice interior, alongside the largest ship I had built previously.
